alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 1:08PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Monmouth County through 145 PM EDT... At 108 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Asbury Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Branch, Asbury Park, Tinton Falls, Manasquan, Elberon, Allenwood, Eatontown, West Long Branch, Oceanport, Neptune City, Spring Lake Heights, Bradley Beach, Shrewsbury, Spring Lake, Avon-By-the-sea, Sea Girt, Interlaken, Deal, Allenhurst and Loch Arbour. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 101 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
